ad_text: Introducing our premium summer footwear collection - now available with exclusive seasonal discount of 40% off. Limited time offer on all sandals, sneakers, and casual shoes. Free shipping on orders over $75.

**Meta:**
Ready for summer? ☀️ Our new premium footwear collection is here with a sizzling 40% off! Grab stylish sandals, fresh sneakers, and comfy casual shoes before this limited-time offer walks away.
